headline: JD Vance Sided With Putin And Now He May Lose The Ohio Senate GOP Primary
author: Jason Easley
sentences: Vance’s Senate candidacy is struggling — he trails multiple GOP primary rivals — and it might ultimately get canceled entirely by GOP primary voters when they choose a nominee this spring.
Vance is backed by billionaire Peter Thiel and at one time looked like he was not only going to win the Ohio Senate Republican primary but also the seat of retiring Republican Sen.
He dumped the Hillbilly Elegy right-wing populism and became another right-wing extremist in a suit backed by a billionaire who refuses to condemn Putin.

Awards and Professional Memberships
Member of the Society of Professional Journalists and The American Political Science Association
Part of the issue for Vance is that he decided to go the Trump/Putin GOP route with his campaign.
His graduate work focused on public policy, with a specialization in social reform movements.
He is also a White House Press Pool and a Congressional correspondent for PoliticusUSA.
JD Vance is currently stuck in third place in the latest Fox News Poll of the state.
Vance bet on Putin and Trump and gamble to cost him the GOP Senate primary in Ohio.
Whether this led to Vance’s cancellation is related to a larger unresolved issue.
He trails Mike Gibbons by 11 points and Josh Mandel by 9 points.
Jason has a Bachelor’s Degree in Political Science.
Mr. Easley is the managing editor.
